document_data.name: House Masq'il'yr
document_data.mainbody: '''House Masq'il'yr''' was a deceased [[drow]] house of [[Menzoberranzan]].
document_data.Description: House Masq'il'yr was one of the seven founding families of Menzoberranzan. It fell during the wars with [[House Nasadra]] when the city was still young. Some of the [[priest]]s and priestesses of this survived as [[ghauroper]]s in an underwater temple beneath [[Donigarten]]. They were worshipers of [[Ghaunadaur]].
